Topic.Title: I got how to do it...

Posts.EditableText:
I understood how to make a game with character changing(althrough you can only do it for one room.)

I want to post it on the QuestWiki, so would Alex allow me to do that?

Posts.EditableText: I suppose you could, but considering this is going to be a built-in feature in an upcoming version of Quest (possibly 5.3?) I don't know how relevant it is. It's up to Alex though I suppose, but maybe you could post what you've discovered on here first so people can at least go through it and make sure it works and how viable it is.
